◆ HandleCollisions()

void India::CollisionComponent::HandleCollisions ( const Direction &  direction)
noexcept

Handles collision in the specified direction; Calls the on collision function if there's a collision in the direction. Calls the second function otherwise.

Here is the caller graph for this function:

◆ IsTrigger()

bool India::CollisionComponent::IsTrigger ( ) const
noexcept

Returns true if this is a trigger. A trigger is a hitbox which is not solid. Example: a door will have a trigger hitbox to detect when something is in front of the door.

Here is the caller graph for this function:
